mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.category_id AS "categoryId", c.label AS "categoryName", a.job_title AS "jobTitle", a.job_location AS "jobLocation", a.job_responsibility AS "jobResponsibility", a.job_requirement AS "jobRequirement", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
JOIN sys_dict c ON c.value = a.category_id and c.type="cms_recruitment_category"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cms_recruitment( id, category_id, job_title, job_location, job_responsibility, job_requirement, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{categoryId}, #{jobTitle}, #{jobLocation}, #{jobResponsibility}, #{jobRequirement}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE cms_recruitment SET category_id = #{categoryId}, job_title = #{jobTitle}, job_location = #{jobLocation}, job_responsibility = #{jobResponsibility}, job_requirement = #{jobRequirement}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
